languages.text: {n}От голоса великана ярость стихии вокруг слегка угасает, словно один звук его речи заставляет смерч отступить. Вы бросаете взгляд на огромного воина и замечаете на груди лазурный извивающийся символ: оттенки голубого, кажется, мерцают и перемешиваются.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}От голоса великана ярость стихии вокруг слегка угасает, словно один звук его речи заставляет смерч отступить. Вы бросаете взгляд на огромного воина и замечаете на груди массивный символ: оскалившийся демон на фоне языков пламени.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The giant's voice causes the storm raging around you to die down somewhat, as if the very sound of his voice is enough to make the whirlwind subside. You glance at the huge warrior, and notice on his chest a winding azure symbol — the shades of blue seem to glimmer and mingle together.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}От голоса великана ярость стихии вокруг слегка угасает, словно один звук его речи заставляет смерч отступить. Вы бросаете взгляд на огромного воина и замечаете на груди лазурный извивающийся символ: оттенки голубого, кажется, мерцают и перемешиваются.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The giant's voice causes the raging wind around you to die down somewhat, as if the very sound of his voice is enough to make the whirlwind retreat. You glance at the huge warrior, and notice on his chest a winding azure symbol — the shades of blue seem to glimmer and intermix.{/n}

{n}The giant's voice causes the storm raging around you to die down somewhat, as if the very sound of his voice is enough to make the whirlwind subside. You glance at the huge warrior, and notice on his chest a winding azure symbol — the shades of blue seem to glimmer and mingle together.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La voz del gigante acalla la tormenta que os rodea parcialmente, como si sus meras palabras pudieran contener el vendaval. Miras al inmenso guerrero y ves en su pecho un sinuoso símbolo azulado cuyos tonos parecen brillar y entremezclarse.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The giant's voice causes the storm raging around you to die down somewhat, as if the very sound of his voice is enough to make the whirlwind subside. You glance at the huge warrior, and notice on his chest a winding azure symbol — the shades of blue seem to glimmer and mingle together.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz del gigante acalla la tormenta que os rodea parcialmente, como si sus meras palabras pudieran contener el vendaval. Miras al inmenso guerrero y ves en su pecho un sinuoso símbolo azulado cuyos tonos parecen brillar y mezclarse.{/n}

languages.text: {n}巨人の声によって周囲に吹き荒れる嵐はいくらか収まる。まるでその声によって旋風が静まったかのようだった。巨大な戦士の方をちらりと見ると、胸元にねじれた紺碧の印が目に入った。青色の濃淡がきらきらと混ざり合っているように見える。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The giant's voice causes the storm raging around you to die down somewhat, as if the very sound of his voice is enough to make the whirlwind subside. You glance at the huge warrior, and notice on his chest a winding azure symbol — the shades of blue seem to glimmer and mingle together.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}巨人の声によって周囲に吹き荒れる嵐はいくらか収まる。まるでその声によって旋風が静まったかのようだった。巨大な戦士の方をちらりと見ると、胸元にねじれた紺碧の印が目に入った。青色の濃淡がきらきらと混ざり合っているように見える。{/n}

languages.text: {n}巨人的声音响了起来，你周围肆虐的风暴似乎减弱了些，仿佛光是他的声音就足以让风暴平息。你瞥了一眼这位体格硕大的战士，注意到他胸前有个弯曲的天蓝色符号，这个蓝色阴影似乎正在不断闪烁着，交融在一起。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The giant's voice causes the storm raging around you to die down somewhat, as if the very sound of his voice is enough to make the whirlwind subside. You glance at the huge warrior, and notice on his chest a winding azure symbol — the shades of blue seem to glimmer and mingle together.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}巨人的声音响了起来，你周围肆虐的风暴似乎减弱了些，仿佛光是他的声音就足以让风暴平息。你瞥了一眼这位体格硕大的战士，注意到他胸前有个弯曲的天蓝色符号，这个蓝色阴影似乎正在不断闪烁着、变化着。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La voix du colosse atténue quelque peu la tempête qui fait rage autour de vous, à croire qu'elle suffit à apaiser les éléments. En jetant un coup d'œil à l'imposant guerrier, vous remarquez sur son torse un symbole azuré sinueux, dont les nuances de bleu semblent se mêler dans un léger scintillement.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The giant's voice causes the storm raging around you to die down somewhat, as if the very sound of his voice is enough to make the whirlwind subside. You glance at the huge warrior, and notice on his chest a winding azure symbol — the shades of blue seem to glimmer and mingle together.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix du colosse atténue quelque peu la tempête qui fait rage autour de vous, à croire qu'elle suffit à apaiser les éléments. En jetant un œil à l'imposant guerrier, vous remarquez sur son torse un symbole azuré sinueux, dont les nuances de bleu semblent s'entremêler dans un léger scintillement.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Stimme des Riesen führt dazu, dass der tosende Sturm um dich herum ein wenig nachlässt, als wäre ihr bloßer Klang genug, um den Wirbelwind zu besänftigen. Du blickst auf den riesigen Krieger und bemerkst auf seiner Brust ein verschlungenes azurblaues Symbol. Die Blautöne scheinen zu schimmern und sich zu vermischen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The giant's voice causes the storm raging around you to die down somewhat, as if the very sound of his voice is enough to make the whirlwind subside. You glance at the huge warrior, and notice on his chest a winding azure symbol — the shades of blue seem to glimmer and mingle together.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Stimme des Riesen führt dazu, dass der tosende Sturm um dich herum ein wenig nachlässt, als wäre ihr bloßer Klang genug, um den Wirbelwind zu besänftigen. Du blickst auf den riesigen Krieger und bemerkst auf seiner Brust ein verschlungenes azurblaues Symbol. Die Blautöne scheinen zu schimmern und sich zu vermischen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Devin sesi, etrafında kopan fırtınayı bir nebze olsun dindiriyor. Âdeta sesinin şiddetiyle esen rüzgârı yavaşlatıyor. Koca savaşçıya baktığında göğsündeki gök mavisi sembolü görüyorsun. Mavi tonları, sembolün içinde dönüp parıldıyor sanki.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The giant's voice causes the storm raging around you to die down somewhat, as if the very sound of his voice is enough to make the whirlwind subside. You glance at the huge warrior, and notice on his chest a winding azure symbol — the shades of blue seem to glimmer and mingle together.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Devin sesi, etrafında kopan fırtınayı bir nebze olsun dindiriyor. Âdeta sesinin şiddetiyle esen rüzgârı yavaşlatıyor. Koca savaşçıya baktığında göğsündeki gök mavisi sembolü görüyorsun. Mavi tonları, sembolün içinde dönüp parıldıyor sanki.{/n}
